Primary Contact: Lynnea Westlind, Coordinator, Community Engagement; Email: lwestlind@arthritis.ca
Service Details: - Provides support for people in the Southern Interior who live with arthritis - Runs educational workshops that include the 4-part workshop series, "Take Charge of Your Arthritis" (Understanding Arthritis, Managing Chronic Pain, Exercising Control Over Arthritis, and Tips, Tricks, and Tools to Manage Your Joints) - Operates an annual summer camp serving children and teens living with arthritis from across BC - Everyone is welcome
Address & Map: The Stewart Centre1855 Kirschner Rd, Ste 260AKelowna, BC     V1Y 4N7View MapQuest Map
Accessibility: Automatic door opener with sloped entrance; ground floor office
